brainly_data.question: A cross between two pea plants results in 732 purple and 268 white plants. what is (are) the genotype(s) and phenotype(s) of the parents that produced these offspring
brainly_data.subject: Biology

all_answers.question: A cross between two pea plants results in 732 purple and 268 white plants. what is (are) the genotype(s) and phenotype(s) of the parents that produced these offspring
all_answers.subject: Biology
all_answers.text:
For the answer to the question above, I believe the answer is that both of the parents are heterozygous purple.
I hope my answer helped you. Have a nice day!
